EPUB and PDF are two of the most popular and widely used ebook formats. While EPUB is the preferred format for most ebook readers, PDFs are versatile and can be read on almost any device. However, if you have an EPUB file and want to read it on a device that only supports PDFs, you need to convert the file format. 

Enter software that can quickly and easily convert your EPUB files to PDFs. In this article, we'll take a look at the best software for converting EPUB to PDF.

## Top Software for Converting EPUB to PDF

### Calibre

Calibre is one of the most popular ebook management tools available, and it includes a robust and easy to use ebook converter. Converting an EPUB file to PDF can be done in just a few steps with Calibre. Simply drag and drop your EPUB file into Calibre, choose the output format as PDF, and click the "Convert" button. Calibre is free and available on Windows, Mac, and Linux.

### Adobe Acrobat Pro DC

Adobe Acrobat Pro DC is a professional PDF editor with conversion capabilities to and from multiple file formats. Adobe Acrobat Pro DC is a paid software with a 7-day trial period, making it a great option if you need to convert multiple EPUB files to PDF for a short project. Its intuitive interface and powerful features make it a popular choice. 

### Ebook Converter

Ebook Converter is a straightforward and effective tool for converting ebook files. The software can handle a variety of ebook formats, including EPUB and PDF, and offers several output options. The software offers a free version, which is limited in features, but the paid version is affordable and packed with more advanced options. 

## Benefits of Converting EPUB to PDF

Converting an EPUB file to PDF offers several benefits. Here are some of the top reasons to consider converting your EPUB files to PDF:

- Compatibility: PDF files can be read on almost any device, making them more versatile than EPUB files.
- Layout: PDFs retain the layout of the original document, making them a preferred choice for documents with complex formatting.
- Printing: Printing PDF files is easy, and they are often the preferred format for printable documents.

## Conclusion

If you have an EPUB file and you need to convert it to PDF, the above-mentioned software will help you get the job done quickly and easily. While each software has its unique set of features, they share a simple and straightforward approach to conversion, making them accessible to those with little technical knowledge. Converting your EPUB files to PDF can make your documents more versatile and easier to share, so give it a try today!
